manifest.name: Torrentio
manifest.description: Provides torrent streams from scraped torrent providers. Currently supports YTS(+), EZTV(+), RARBG(+), 1337x(+), ThePirateBay(+), KickassTorrents(+), TorrentGalaxy(+), MagnetDL(+), HorribleSubs(+), NyaaSi(+), TokyoTosho(+), AniDex(+), Rutor(+), Rutracker(+), Comando(+), BluDV(+), Torrent9(+), ilCorSaRoNeRo(+), MejorTorrent(+), Wolfmax4k(+), Cinecalidad(+), BestTorrents(+). To configure providers, RealDebrid/Premiumize/AllDebrid/DebridLink/EasyDebrid/Offcloud/TorBox/Put.io support and other settings visit https://torrentio.strem.fun

manifest.name: KnightCrawler | ElfHosted
manifest.description: KnightCrawler Community: torrent streams provided by popular trackers and DMM hashes
manifest.descriptionHTML:
This is an ElfHosted instance of KnightCrawler, a fork of torrentio.strem.fm, which provides torrent streams from torrent providers' RSS feeds, and DebridMediaManager hashes.

The public instance (knightcrawler.elfhosted.com) is provided free for public use, and rate-limited appropriately for casual individual streaming use (not automation).

ElfHosted is an open-source PaaS built and run by geeks, which self-hosts your favorite streaming apps for you automatically and easily.

Hosted / private KnightCrawler instances with rate-limits appropriate for automation are available.

An internal, un-rate-limited instance is provided free, with all ElfHosted apps, for automation.

What is ElfHosted?

ElfHosted is an open-source platform for "self-hosting" Plex with Real Debrid (using plex_debrid, Riven, or Radarr & Sonarr), and your awesome self-hosted apps, automatically and easily.

We support the Stremio community (Reddit / Discord) by providing free hosting for some of the best Stremio Addons, including those which enable you to:

See the ElfHosted Stremio Addons Guide for more addons!

üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüë¶‚Äçüë¶ Share your Real Debrid / Stremio from multiple locations at once (Comet)
üéÅ Watch your paid IPTV with Stremio (Xtremio)
üì∫ Install a Stremio Live TV addon (MediaFusion)
üèà Watch recorded / live sports with Stremio (MediaFusion)

manifest.name: The Movie Database Addon
manifest.description: Stremio addon that provides rich metadata for movies and TV shows from TMDB, featuring customizable catalogs, multi-language support, favorites lists, watchlist, ratings, and IMDb integration. manifest.name: Orion
manifest.description: Orion Stremio Addon, allows Orion-indexed torrent, usenet and hoster links to be played on Stremio. Cached links can be played with RealDebrid, AllDebrid, Debrid-Link, Premiumize or Offcloud. Torrents can be streamed without using any Debrid service. Orion API key is required to use this addon. Get it from panel.orionoid.com

manifest.name: TorBox
manifest.description: Provides torrent streams for users of TorBox. With zero config, and a free account you can instantly start watching your favorite torrents using TorBox. To add with streaming support, go to your TorBox settings and click the Access Stremio Addon button! Configuration can be done from the TorBox settings, which are propagated instantly, no need to reinstall the addon! Requires a TorBox account to stream. Get started for free at https://torbox.app
